sentences.en: One can then resurrect and reconstitute all molecules.
sentences.cn: 随后你就能重建所有的分子.

sentences.en: The committees will be reconstituted after the election.
sentences.cn: 委员会将在选举后改组。

sentences.en: The major Methods: Used to reconstitute the company are acquisition of companies and merging.
sentences.cn: 公司重组的方式有公司收购和公司兼并.

sentences.en: To reconstitute dried tomatoes, simmer in plain water until they are tender.
sentences.cn: 要泡开西红柿干，需要将其放在清水中用文火炖，直到它们变软。

sentences.en: Use warm water to reconstitute dried milk powder.

trans.tran_cn: 重新组成, 重新设立
trans.tran_en: to form an organization or a group again in a different way

trans.tran_cn: 再组成，再构成，加水使（脱水食物）复原
